attributes.action: Petition for the resignation of Prime Minister David Cameron
attributes.background: After our PM has dodged the question for days, he has admitted to personally profited from his late father investment firm, which was based in a tax haven in the Bahamas. This is uncalled for a Prime Minister as he has betrayed the trust of the British people who deserves better than half truths.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
